forum.content:
Well I'm looking for woman(not girl)
Who's about 165cm+ not to fat not to skinny
Well looks are impt (if we will marry and have a child )
Independent income as require
Age between 24~32
Can play instruments (doesn't matter what you play with )

Something about me
I'm 183cm little fat
I have independent income
Out going straight man
Don't like argument
Love travel / music / sport

我想找個女人（不是女孩）
身高165以上 身材不用太胖也不願太瘦
長相需要的（未來結婚生孩子基因重要）
穩定收入
年齡24～32
會玩音樂（任何樂器都行）

我個人183 有點胖
穩定收入
外相 也很直接
不喜歡爭吵 不喜歡麻煩
我愛旅行 玩音樂 跟運動

簽名：中文很差的僑
forum.title: What I need
